sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { apiClient } from '../../utils/api'; import { Report, User } from '../../types'; interface DashboardStats { totalReports: number; pendingReports: number; completedReports: number; totalUsers: number; totalCollectors: number; totalPoints: number; recentReports: Report[]; topCitizens: User[]; } const AdminDashboard: React.FC = () => { const [stats, setStats] = useState(null); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true); const [error, setError] = useState(null); useEffect(() => { fetchDashboardStats(); }, []); const fetchDashboardStats = async () => { try { setLoading(true); const response = await apiClient.get('/analytics/dashboard'); setStats(response.data); } catch (err: any) { setError(err.response?.data?.message || 'Failed to fetch dashboard stats'); } finally { setLoading(false); } }; const getStatusBadge = (status: string) => { const statusClasses = { pending: 'status-pending', verified: 'status-verified', assigned: 'status-assigned', 'in-progress': 'status-in-progress', completed: 'status-completed', rejected: 'status-rejected' }; return statusClasses[status as keyof typeof statusClasses] || 'status-pending'; }; if (loading) { return (
); } if (error) { return (

{error}

); } if (!stats) return null; return (
{/* Header */}

Admin Dashboard

{/* Stats Grid */}

Total Reports

{stats.totalReports}

Pending Reports

{stats.pendingReports}

Completed Reports

{stats.completedReports}

Total Users

{stats.totalUsers}

Active Collectors

{stats.totalCollectors}

Total Points Awarded

{stats.totalPoints.toLocaleString()}

{/* Recent Reports and Top Citizens */}
{/* Recent Reports */}

Recent Reports

{stats.recentReports.map((report) => (

{report.wasteType}

{report.location.address}

{new Date(report.createdAt).toLocaleDateString()}

{report.status}
))} {stats.recentReports.length === 0 && (

No recent reports

)}
{/* Top Citizens */}

Top Citizens

{stats.topCitizens.map((citizen, index) => (
#{index + 1}

{citizen.name}

{citizen.email}

{citizen.points} pts

{citizen.reportsSubmitted || 0} reports

))} {stats.topCitizens.length === 0 && (

No citizens data

)}
{/* Quick Actions */}

Quick Actions

); }; export default AdminDashboard;
